languages.text: Once the combat is over, the wounds of all party members are replenished automatically, but any {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} they may have sustained remain — those can be healed with a medikit. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. Whenever a character uses a medikit in battle, a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} that will be restored as a result. Abelard can heal your character's injury. Click [LMB] on Abelard's portrait, select the medikit on the panel at the bottom left of the screen, then use it on your character. Abelard needs to be standing right next to your character for him to administer the treatment.
languages.original_text: После боя здоровье всех членов отряда восстанавливается автоматически, однако полученные ранения остаются — их можно вылечить с помощью медкомплекта. Использовать медкомплект могут только персонажи со способностью Мастерство медицины. Если персонаж использует медкомплект в бою, то от результата проверки навыка Медицина зависит количество восстановленных очков {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. Абеляр может излечить ранение вашего персонажа. Кликните [ЛКМ] на портрете Абеляра, затем выберите медкомплект на панели в нижней левой части экрана и примените его на вашем персонаже. Абеляр должен стоять вплотную к вашему персонажу, чтобы исцелить его.

traits.locale_text: After the combat, the Wounds of all members of the party are restored automatically, but the received Injuries remain — they can be cured with the use of a Medikit. Old Injuries can also be removed with a Medikit, but require an additional {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} check. Traumas can only be healed in the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s quarters on the voidship.

Once the combat is over, the wounds of all party members are replenished automatically, but any {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} they may have sustained remain — those can be healed with a medikit. Only characters who have the Medicae Training feature can use medikits. Whenever a character uses a medikit in battle, a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} that will be restored as a result. Abelard can heal your character's injury. Click [LMB] on Abelard's portrait, select the medikit on the panel at the bottom left of the screen, then use it on your character. Abelard needs to be standing right next to your character for him to administer the treatment.

Once the combat is over, the wounds of all party members are replenished automatically, but any {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} they may have sustained remain — those can be healed with a medikit. Only characters who have the Medicae Training feature can use medikits. Whenever a character uses a medikit in battle, a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} that will be restored as a result. Abelard can heal your character's injury. Click [LMB] on Abelard's portrait, select the medikit on the panel at the bottom left of the screen, then use it on your character. Abelard needs to be standing right next to your character for him to administer the treatment.

Once the combat is over, the wounds of all party members are replenished automatically, but any {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} they may have sustained remain — those can be healed with a medikit. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. Whenever a character uses a medikit in battle, a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} that will be restored as a result. Abelard can heal your character's injury. Click [LMB] on Abelard's portrait, select the medikit on the panel at the bottom left of the screen, then use it on your character. Abelard needs to be standing right next to your character for him to administer the treatment.

Once the combat is over, the wounds of all party members are replenished automatically, but any {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} they may have sustained remain — those can be healed with a medikit. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. Whenever a character uses a medikit in battle, a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} that will be restored as a result. Abelard can heal your character's injury. Click [LMB] on Abelard's portrait, select the medikit on the panel at the bottom left of the screen, then use it on your character. Abelard needs to be standing right next to your character for him to administer the treatment.

Once the combat is over, the wounds of all party members are replenished automatically, but any {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} they may have sustained remain — those can be healed with a medikit. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. Whenever a character uses a medikit in battle, a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} that will be restored as a result. Abelard can heal your character's injury. Click [LMB] on Abelard's portrait, select the medikit on the panel at the bottom left of the screen, then use it on your character. Abelard needs to be standing right next to your character for him to administer the treatment.

languages.text: После боя здоровье всех членов отряда восстанавливается автоматически, однако полученные ранения остаются — их можно вылечить с помощью медкомплекта. Использовать медкомплект может только персонаж, освоивший Лечение в бою, Базовый навык: Медицина или вложивший хотя бы одно очко в развитие навыка {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}медицина{/g} при повышении уровня. Если персонаж использует медкомплект в бою, то от результата проверки навыка Медицина зависит количество восстановленного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. Абеляр может излечить ранение вашего персонажа. Кликните [ЛКМ] на портрете Абеляра, затем выберите медкомплект на панели в нижней левой части экрана и примените его на вашем персонаже. Абеляр должен стоять вплотную к вашему персонажу, чтобы исцелить его.
languages.original_text: Once the combat is over, the wounds of all party members are replenished automatically, but any {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} they may have sustained remain — those can be healed with a medikit. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. Whenever a character uses a medikit in battle, a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} that will be restored as a result. Abelard can heal your character's injury. Click [LMB] on Abelard's portrait, select the medikit on the panel at the bottom left of the screen, then use it on your character. Abelard needs to be standing right next to your character for him to administer the treatment.

languages.text: 战斗结束之后，所有队员的生命值都会自动回满，但队员在战斗中受到的{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}依然会保留。这些伤势可以使用医疗包治愈。 只有拥有野战医疗特性，或拥有基础技能：医疗，或至少进阶过{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}技能一次的角色才能使用医疗包。在战斗中使用医疗包时，{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}结果会决定医疗包恢复多少点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。 阿贝拉德可以治疗角色的伤势。鼠标左键点击阿贝拉德的头像，选择屏幕左下角面板的医疗包，之后对您的角色使用医疗包。阿贝拉德必须站在您的角色旁边，才能进行医疗。
languages.original_text: Once the combat is over, the wounds of all party members are replenished automatically, but any {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} they may have sustained remain — those can be healed with a medikit. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. Whenever a character uses a medikit in battle, a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} that will be restored as a result. Abelard can heal your character's injury. Click [LMB] on Abelard's portrait, select the medikit on the panel at the bottom left of the screen, then use it on your character. Abelard needs to be standing right next to your character for him to administer the treatment.

traits.locale_text: 战斗结束之后，所有队员的生命值都会自动回满，但队员在战斗中受到的{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}依然会保留。这些伤势可以使用医疗包治愈。 只有拥有医疗训练特性的角色，才能使用医疗包。在战斗中使用医疗包时，{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}结果会决定医疗包恢复多少{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}点生命值{/g}。 阿贝拉德可以治疗角色的伤势。鼠标左键点击阿贝拉德的头像，选择屏幕左下角面板的医疗包，之后对您的角色使用医疗包。阿贝拉德必须站在您的角色旁边，才能进行医疗。

languages.text: 戦闘が終了すると、部隊の全メンバーの傷が自動的に回復するが、受けた{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}は残る。メディキットで治療可能だ。 メディキットを使えるのは、戦場衛生兵か基本スキル：メディケアを持つキャラクター、または{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}スキルを最低1度アップさせたキャラクターのみである。キャラクターが戦闘でメディキットを使用するたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}が始まって、その結果で回復する{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}の量が決まる。 アベラルドはキャラクターの負傷を治療することが可能。アベラルドのポートレートで[LMB]をクリックして、画面左下のパネルでメディキットを選択し、キャラクターに使用する。アベラルドが治療を行うには、キャラクターのすぐ隣に立っている必要がある。
languages.original_text: Once the combat is over, the wounds of all party members are replenished automatically, but any {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} they may have sustained remain — those can be healed with a medikit. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. Whenever a character uses a medikit in battle, a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} that will be restored as a result. Abelard can heal your character's injury. Click [LMB] on Abelard's portrait, select the medikit on the panel at the bottom left of the screen, then use it on your character. Abelard needs to be standing right next to your character for him to administer the treatment.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘が終了すると、パーティーメンバー全員の負傷は自動的に回復するが、受けた{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}怪我{/g}は残る。これらはメディキットで治すことができる。 メディケアトレーニングの特性を持っているキャラクターのみが、メディキットを使用できる。キャラクターが戦闘中にメディキットを使用するたび、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}によって回復する{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}の数が決定する。 アベラルドはキャラクターの怪我を治すことができる。ポートレート上で [LMB] をクリックして画面左下のパネルでメディキットを選択し、キャラクターに使用する。アベラルドが治療を行うには、キャラクターのすぐ隣に立っている必要がある。

languages.text: Cuando concluye el combate, se sanan automáticamente las heridas de todos los miembros del grupo. Sus {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g}, sin embargo, se conservan y solo pueden tratarse con un botiquín. Solo los personajes con la aptitud Médico de combate, la habilidad básica: Medicae o los que hayan avanzado la habilidad {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} al menos una vez pueden usar botiquines. Cuando un personaje utiliza un botiquín en combate, una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} determina la cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} que restaura. Abelard puede curar la lesión de tu personaje. Pulsa [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre el retrato de Abelard, selecciona el botiquín en el panel de la parte inferior izquierda de la pantalla y úsalo en tu personaje. Abelard tiene que encontrarse junto a tu personaje para tratar sus heridas.
languages.original_text: Once the combat is over, the wounds of all party members are replenished automatically, but any {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} they may have sustained remain — those can be healed with a medikit. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. Whenever a character uses a medikit in battle, a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} that will be restored as a result. Abelard can heal your character's injury. Click [LMB] on Abelard's portrait, select the medikit on the panel at the bottom left of the screen, then use it on your character. Abelard needs to be standing right next to your character for him to administer the treatment.

traits.locale_text: Cuando concluye el combate, se sanan automáticamente las heridas de todos los miembros del grupo. Sus {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g}, sin embargo, se conservan y solo pueden tratarse con un botiquín. Solo los personajes con la característica Instrucción medicae pueden utilizar los botiquines. Cuando un personaje haga uso de un botiquín en combate, una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}medicae{/g} determinará el número de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} que se acabarán sanando. Abelard puede tratar las lesiones de tu personaje. Pulsa el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre el retrato de Abelard para elegir el botiquín en el panel de la parte inferior izquierda de la pantalla. A continuación, úsalo en tu personaje. Abelard debe estar al lado de tu personaje para que le administre el tratamiento.

languages.text: Nach dem Kampf werden die Wunden aller Gruppenmitglieder automatisch wieder aufgefüllt, aber alle {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g}, die sie erlitten haben, bleiben bestehen – diese können mit einem Medikit geheilt werden. Nur Charaktere, die über die Gefechtssanitäter-Eigenschaft oder die Grundfertigkeit: Medicae verfügen oder mindestens einmal den Fertigkeitsfortschritt {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} erhalten haben, können Medikits benutzen. Immer wenn ein Charakter im Kampf ein Medikit benutzt, bestimmt eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} auf die {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeit{/g} die Anzahl der {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, die dadurch wiederhergestellt werden. Abelard kann die Verletzung deines Charakters heilen. Klicke mit [LMB] auf Abelards Porträt, wähle das Medikit im Feld in der unteren linken Bildschirmecke aus, und wende es dann auf deinen Charakter an. Abelard muss direkt neben deinem Charakter stehen, damit er die Behandlung durchführen kann.
languages.original_text: Once the combat is over, the wounds of all party members are replenished automatically, but any {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} they may have sustained remain — those can be healed with a medikit. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. Whenever a character uses a medikit in battle, a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} that will be restored as a result. Abelard can heal your character's injury. Click [LMB] on Abelard's portrait, select the medikit on the panel at the bottom left of the screen, then use it on your character. Abelard needs to be standing right next to your character for him to administer the treatment.

traits.locale_text: Nach dem Kampf werden die Wunden aller Gruppenmitglieder automatisch wieder aufgefüllt, aber alle {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g}, die sie erlitten haben, bleiben bestehen – diese können mit einem Medikit geheilt werden. Nur Charaktere, die über die Medicae-Ausbildung verfügen, können Medikits benutzen. Immer wenn ein Charakter im Kampf ein Medikit benutzt, bestimmt eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} auf die {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeit{/g} die Anzahl der {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, die dadurch wiederhergestellt werden. Abelard kann die Verletzung deines Charakters heilen. Klicke mit der [LMB] auf Abelards Porträt aus, wähle das Medikit im Feld in der unteren linken Bildschirmecke aus, und wende es dann auf deinen Charakter an. Abelard muss direkt neben deinem Charakter stehen, damit er die Behandlung durchführen kann.

languages.text: Une fois le combat terminé, les réserves de blessures de tous les membres du groupe se reconstituent automatiquement, mais les {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésions{/g} qu'ils ont pu subir demeurent. Elles peuvent cependant être soignées grâce à un médikit. Les médikits ne peuvent être utilisés que par les personnages possédant la caractéristique Soins de terrain, la compétence de base Medicae ou ayant reçu au moins une amélioration de la compétence {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Au combat, chaque fois qu'un personnage utilise un médikit, un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} détermine la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} qui sera rétablie en conséquence. Abélard peut soigner la lésion de votre personnage. Cliquez avec le [LMB] sur le portrait d'Abélard, sélectionnez le médikit dans le panneau en bas à gauche de l'écran, puis utilisez-le sur votre personnage. Abélard doit se trouver à côté de votre personnage pour le soigner.
languages.original_text: Once the combat is over, the wounds of all party members are replenished automatically, but any {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} they may have sustained remain — those can be healed with a medikit. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. Whenever a character uses a medikit in battle, a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} that will be restored as a result. Abelard can heal your character's injury. Click [LMB] on Abelard's portrait, select the medikit on the panel at the bottom left of the screen, then use it on your character. Abelard needs to be standing right next to your character for him to administer the treatment.

traits.locale_text: Une fois le combat terminé, les réserves de blessures de tous les membres du groupe se reconstituent automatiquement, mais les {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésions{/g} qu'ils ont pu subir demeurent. Seuls les personnages dotés de la caractéristique Formation à Medicae peuvent utiliser des médikits. Au combat, chaque fois qu'un personnage utilise un médikit, un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} détermine la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} qui sera rétablie en conséquence. Abélard peut soigner la lésion de votre personnage. Cliquez avec le [LMB] sur le portrait d'Abélard, sélectionnez le médikit dans le panneau situé en bas à gauche de l'écran, puis utilisez-le sur votre personnage. Abélard doit se trouver à côté de votre personnage pour le soigner.
